Mandibuzz (TCG)

  • Language
  • Watch
  • View source
← #0629: Vullaby
Pokémon
#0631: Heatmor →

Mandibuzz has been featured on 9 different cards since it debuted in the Black & White expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Mandibuzz cards are normally Darkness-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Mandibuzz

Mandibuzz
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
